If you're looking for a review you've come to the wrong place, if you're here to cook a pie then read on !
Napoleon from the final puff pastry 
You will need: 
Ready flaky pastry - 1.5 kg five eggs Flour - 150 g> Sugar - 400 grams Milk - 1200 ml Vanilla sugar - 1 n. Cognac - 1 tbsp. l. Shelled walnuts - glass sequence of preparation: dough defrost naturally at room temperature (defrost time indicated on the package). Cook the custard: grind the egg yolks with a mixer or a whisk to a conventional incandescent and vanilla sugar, flour and brandy to enter the mix. The mixture pour a trickle of milk, stir and cook, stirring constantly. Divide the dough into the desired number of pieces that will later Korzh. Roll out each piece on a board sprinkled with flour. Bake in the oven for about 10 minutes until golden color on a dry baking temperature of 200 degrees. Fluff the cooled cream cakes. If desired, each layer sprinkled with chopped nuts. On top of the cake lightly press smeared with cream and sprinkle all sides crumbs. Add layer cake in a cool place overnight.

Half Life 2 is probably Valves greatest acheivment, I think it is my favorite first person shooetr ever! It is up there with painkiller and Bioshock. I see no real problems with this game or any of the episodes. The only problem that I see at all is the cliffhanger at the end of episode 2. Now, People are giving Mr.Newell a very hard time about this, and I think that they are indeed trying to make a third game, they just need to complete source 2. And if you think that it is because he hates the number 3, WTF is the matter with you? So, Half Life 2, Play IT!
Dated, but still a great atmospheric game. Everyone needs to play it at least once.

Let me tell you, this game is by no means easy. I mean that in the best way possible. The game is full of little challenges; parkour, mind puzzles, mazes, and just when you think that you've reached a safezone - BOOM! - there's some new enemy to fight. Ravenholme had me terrified, and I think it was because of the pacing and the atmosphere. 

The ending of the game is the next thing I'm going to ramble on about. (Don't worry, no spoilers.) The ending of this game left me asking so many questions. I have yet to play Episode One or Episode Two, but from what I've heard Episode Two comes with an even bigger cliffhanger. I can't describe how amazingly cryptic the ending to Half Life 2 is, you'll just have to experience it yourself. 

9/10 Pacing

10/10 Soundtrack

9/10 Story

9/10 Graphics (For 2004)

10/10 DOG

Bought this game with The Orange Box. Never really thought about playing it. I heard about how so many people were mad at Valve for not making a Half-Life 3. I decided to start playing it.

-Strange man I recognize from Garry's Mod breathing in my face
-Find out my name is Gordan Freeman
-Wonder why my name is so close to Morgan Freeman
-Get out of a subway
-Get harrassed by Cops
-One cop is my friend
-Almost die because of him
-Continually almost die because of him
Fast Forward
-Continually being put in harms way because of a man named Breen
-Finally find him
-Explosion
-Finally get up from PC
-Hear about petition and mob going to Valve HQ

10/10 Would Riot against Valve to get HL3

Half-Life 2, the second installment in the critically acclaimed HALF-LIFE series...

Bar none the best game ever created IMO and still holds true to this day.  I have played other games that may have come close but I find myself replaying this game annually, kinda like visiting an old friend. As with an old friend, when you get together it's like time never passed and you pick up right where you left off.  The story, the action, variety of gameplay, weapon variety and tasks to solve are all top notch. I rank this as one of the greatest pieces of Sci Fi entertainment ever (movies, books, games). I have yet to find a better weapon than the modified gravity gun in any other game.  Play it, you won't be disappointed.

[h1]Half Life 2 is the best modern Old-School-Shooter.[/h1]

PROs:
-minimalistic but still amazing plot
-lovely characters (Alyx)
-still beautiful graphics
-amazing start (Rise and Shine) and end
-outstanding soundtrack
-over the top gameplay (NO Auto-Healing and NO Cover)
-incredible dystopian atmosphere
-very fun and futuristic weapons (GRAVITY GUN)
-one level better than the other (Ravenholm)

CONs:
-too easy (enemy AI)
-frustrating loading times
-no real sequel =((((  !!!!!!!!!!!!!!WHERE IS HL3!!!!!!!!!!!!

Lo recomiendo. Es un juego IMPRESCINDIBLE para tu biblioteca

И ОЧЕНЬ ОЧЕНЬ Много ПлюСОВ

К самой игре в плане геймлея, сюжета и графики никаких претензий нет - все отлично, понравилось еще в год выхода.
Но, какого ****** игра сыпит таким количеством ошибок вплоть до синего/черного экрана? Пять минут игры - крит и вылет на рабочий стол. Ладно, подгружаемся. 7 минут игры - черный экран, рекавери драйвера видеокарты, вылет на рабочий стол. Ну, не везет, наверное. Снова загружаемся. 4 минуты игры - синий экран и хард ресет. Ладно, может что-то с системой. Переустанавливаем систему по-чистому. Все работает. Batman Arkham Knight - 70+ FPS на максималках, StarCraft 2 - идет без нареканий, GTA, Saints Row - все отлично идет. Запускаем HL2 - 6 минут и синий экран. Коды ошибок недвусмысленно указывают на отсуствие оптимизации под Win 7 х64, обращение к устаревшим драйверам и посему - падение системы/откат драйверов. Тогда возникает вопрос: почему неоптимизировано? И если так, то игра должна вообще отдаваться бесплатно. Сколько лет прошло - это раз, под старшие системы оптимизации минимум - это два. Те, у кого "Вси работаит! У тибя кревыи руки!" (обладатели ХP - калькуляторов?) могут сразу идти в известном направлении. Мне ваше "все работает" до лампочки и беспокоит только то, что именно я не могу нормально поиграть, при этом могу нормально играть во все другое.
Примечание: эпизоды один и два идут идеально. Вывод: что-то не так конкретно с оригиналом.
